name: Monster Racers [NDS]
description: Exclusively for Nintendo DS, 'Monster Racers' will take players on a quest around the globe in search of monster breeds to train, nurture, and race. Throughout their journeys, players will build lasting friendships with new allies, and encounter daunting challenges from a bevy of rival racers! By combining real-time racing and platform-style action with the fun of monster collecting and breeding, Monster Racers brings to life a colorful and unforgettable world that has fallen in love with this exciting new sport.
